description: man wearing blue jacket and brown pants, with peach-colored sack over his shoulder, walking on grassy riverbank; boats on water; bridge with arches in ULQ; buildings on opposite shore
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date and Inscription

see Signed; LRC, in pencil: illegible inscription; URC, in pencil: [L164]
provenance: [Eric G. Carlson, New York, until 1995; sold in July for LTO, to Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (1995-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
signed: LRC, in the print: [Eug Béjot - Paris 99 -]; LRC, in pencil: [Eug Béjot]; on back, in pencil: [Entre Paris et Chaventon]
title: Between Paris and Charenton
